channel.title: Need help! How do i change the Xp rates, its too hard!
channel.description:
I want to know how to change the XP rates on my server, its far too hard. ;)
Thanks.

item.title: Need help! How do i change the Xp rates, its too hard!
item.dc:creator: @Extoz Extoz
item.description:
@Extoz wrote:

WRX, instead of telling him that it’s not hard you could at least tell him how.

Okay…
Open up Client.Java

Search for

TotalExp = (double)

You should now see something like this…

						TotalExp = (double) (100 * hitDiff * 2); // added *2 for
						// faster
						// leveling
						// -bakatool
						TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
						addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), 4);
					} else if (FightType != 3) {

If you want like 50 xp per hit it should say

						TotalExp = (double) (25 * hitDiff * 2); // added *2 for
						// faster
						// leveling
						// -bakatool
						TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
						addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), 4);
					} else if (FightType != 3) {

What you change is this… (double) (THIS * hitDiff..

Read full topic
